TopicTitle: who knows a mod for organize parts in VAB

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

bevor the 0.90 update I used this mod:

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220245-simple-part-organizer-version-1-2-1

but it won't support the 0.90 version anymore.

who knows a mod which sorts the Parts by mods? for example: if I highlight the B9 Aerospace mod in the VAB, it will show me ONLY the parts of the B9 Aerospace mod.

Thank you for you help and sorry for my bad english

I don't know of any mods atm that do this but I'm sure someone else might be able to point you to one.

However one thing that can help is that if you click advanced mode in the top left now, you can make your own categories and part lists for your convencience. I have a seperate one for wings and another for plane engines and the like for example. Takes some times to make these for yourself but once you've got them set up it works perfectly.

I just wish you could sort AND filter. Within the already set categories.

Why can't I sort all purchased solar panels by cost without creating and maintaining my own custom category?

That one is WIP:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104231

If the construction menues are too crowded, you can also take a look at my SETI-BalanceMod, link is in my signature.
